answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Sandra - It would be worth a call to Concord and Sunnyvale CA and Bellevue WA.  They all have very sophisticated performance based budgeting systems whereby all internal services charge for internal services (IT, Fleet, etc.) and have reporting systems for the CM and Council.
Good luck,
Pam Muse
